wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.test

Class TestAwtImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.test.TestAwtImage

  • public class TestAwtImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to test image conversions from ImageCore slices to regular AWT images in Java. This is especially useful to load or export image slices ad regular image files (e.g. PNG) or to use AWT features such as drawing into an image.
    See Also:
    ImageCoreFactory.createFromAwtImages(java.awt.image.BufferedImage[]), ImageConvert, TestImageDraw

      • saveAwtImage

        public static void saveAwtImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                java.io.File imageFile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to save an AWT image to an image file.
        Parameters:
        img - The input AWT image to save.
        imageFile - Abstract pathname to an image file where to save the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of failure to read the image.

      • loadPngImagesInDirectory

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] loadPngImagesInDirectory(java.lang.String sourceImageDirectory)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to load an array with all the PNG images contained in a given directory The search for images inside the directory is not recursive.
        Parameters:
        sourceImageDirectory - Path to a directory containing (hopefully) PNG images
        Returns:
        An array with all the images loaded from the PNG file directly inside the directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the path does not lead to a directory or failure to read an image.
